statements: UPDATE flight_schedule SET price = 250.50, available_seats = 100 WHERE flight_id = 123
UPDATE flight_schedule SET arrival_airport = 'New York', departure_time = '2022-05-15 10:00:00' WHERE flight_id = 456
UPDATE flight_schedule SET price = 1500.00, available_seats = 100 WHERE flight_id = 123
UPDATE flight_schedule SET departure_time = '2022-08-15 10:00:00', arrival_time = '2022-08-15 14:00:00' WHERE flight_name = 'Flight XYZ'
UPDATE FlightSchedules SET departure_time = '2022-07-15 09:00:00' WHERE flight_id = 1;
UPDATE Pricing SET price = 250.00 WHERE pricing_id = 3;
UPDATE FlightSchedules SET available_seats = available_seats - 1 WHERE flight_id = 101
UPDATE Pricing SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE ticket_type = 'Business'
UPDATE flight_schedules SET airline = 'Delta Airlines' WHERE flight_id = 12345;
UPDATE pricing SET price = 799.99, currency = 'USD' WHERE pricing_id = 67890;
UPDATE flight_schedules SET departure_location = 'New York', departure_time = '2022-09-15 10:00:00' WHERE flight_id = 123
UPDATE pricing SET price = 500.00, currency = 'USD', discount_available = TRUE WHERE pricing_id = 456
UPDATE FlightSchedules SET departure_airport = 'JFK' WHERE flight_id = 1;
UPDATE Availability SET available_seats = 150 WHERE flight_id = 2;
UPDATE FlightSchedules SET arrival_time = '2022-12-31 23:59:59', departure_time = '2022-12-31 22:00:00' WHERE flight_id = 1234;
UPDATE Pricing SET price = 350.50 WHERE flight_id = 5678 AND ticket_type = 'First Class';
UPDATE flights SET price = 2500.00 WHERE flight_id = 1001;
UPDATE passengers SET phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890' WHERE passenger_id = 2002;
UPDATE flights SET price = 3500.00 WHERE flight_number = 'AB123';
UPDATE reservations SET reservation_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE reservation_id = 101;
